On Tue, Dec 22, 2009 at 3:11 PM, Will Hartung <willh@...> wrote:

> As for "evolutionary" software, it's pretty clear that it doesn't
> evolve. Rather you have backward compatibility that gives an illusion
> of evolution. The existing clients aren't changing, the service is
> simply being friendly by keeping them in mind and not locking them
> out.
>

You're right. Protocols evolve. Software doesn't.

Thanks for reminding me of this.

-- Nick

--001485f6295c3e126a047b58092a
